trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of cells that are selected in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
The order of cells in the collection is not guaranteed to match the order in which they were selected.
trans-unit.target: Порядок ячеек в коллекции не обязательно совпадает с порядком, в котором они были выбраны.

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection.
This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Данный метод не применим к этому классу.

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection> class directly.
trans-unit.target: Невозможно изменить <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection> напрямую.

trans-unit.source: To clear the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClearSelection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Чтобы очистить <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection>, используйте <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClearSelection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> метод.

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection" />.
Determines whether the specified cell is contained in the collection.
<see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="dataGridViewCell" /> is in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The one-dimensional array of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> that is the destination of the elements copied from the collection.
The array must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in <c>array</c> at which copying begins.
Copies the elements of the collection to the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> array, starting at the specified index.
<paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
<paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
-or-

The number of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" /> is greater than the available space from <paramref name="index" /> to the end of <paramref name="array" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" /> cannot be cast automatically to the type of <paramref name="array" />.
The index at which <c>dataGridViewCell</c> should be inserted.
The object to be added to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection" />.
Inserts a cell into the collection.
This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Данный метод не применим к этому классу.

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection> class directly.
trans-unit.target: Невозможно изменить <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection> напрямую.

trans-unit.source: To add a cell to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Selected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Чтобы добавить в ячейку, чтобы <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection>, используйте <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Selected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> свойство.

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
The index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> to get from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection" />.
Gets the cell at the specified index.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Параметр <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> по указанному индексу.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than 0.
-or-
<paramref name="index" /> is equal to or greater than the number of cells in the collection.
Gets a list of elements in the collection.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> containing the elements of the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> Содержит элементы из коллекции.

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the collection.
The array must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in <c>array</c> at which copying begins.
Copies the elements of the collection to the specified array, starting at the specified index.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Этот член представляет собой явную реализацию члена интерфейса.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: Он может использоваться, только если экземпляр <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection> приведен к типу интерфейса <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
<paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
-or-

The number of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" /> is greater than the available space from <paramref name="index" /> to the end of <paramref name="array" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" /> cannot be cast automatically to the type of <paramref name="array" />.
Gets the number of elements in the collection.
The number of elements in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Количество элементов в коллекции.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Этот член представляет собой явную реализацию члена интерфейса.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: Он может использоваться, только если экземпляр <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection> приведен к типу интерфейса <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the collection is synchronized (thread safe).
<see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Значение <see langword="false" /> во всех случаях.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Объект, который может использоваться для синхронизации доступа к <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> that can be used to iterate through the collection.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Этот член представляет собой явную реализацию члена интерфейса.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Он может использоваться, только если экземпляр <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection> приведен к типу интерфейса <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>.

trans-unit.source: The item to be added to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection" />.
Implements the <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Add(System.Object)" /> method.
Always throws <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />.
The position into which the new element was inserted.
You cannot change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection> class directly.
trans-unit.target: Невозможно изменить <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection> напрямую.
